name: v0.39.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_mypy", version = "0.39.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Update dependency mypy to ~=1.17.1 by @renovate-thm[bot] in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/109


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.38.0...v0.39.0

name: v0.38.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_mypy", version = "0.38.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Add support for rules_pycross by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/106
* Set PYTHONNOUSERSITE=true for all mypy actions by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/104
* Fix mypy linting non-python source files with custom rules by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/105
* Add missing hashes for mypy dep by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/103
* Update dependency mypy to ~=1.17.0 by @renovate-thm[bot] in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/108


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.37.0...v0.38.0

name: v0.37.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_mypy", version = "0.37.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Fix issue when importing generated stubs with absolute paths by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/99
* Provide an exclusion for requirement type mappings by @adam-singer in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/94
* Fix output bin_dir directory shadowing source directory by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/91
* Update dependency mypy to ~=1.16.1 by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/100

## New Contributors
* @brandonchinn178 made their first contribution in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/99
* @adam-singer made their first contribution in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/94

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.36.0...v0.37.0

name: v0.17.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_mypy", version = "0.17.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Remove python 3.12 specific API by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/52
* Split out version markers in requirements.txt by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/53
* Allow disabling color in output by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

name: v0.16.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_mypy", version = "0.16.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Enable overriding py_binary rule used in mypy_cli by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/45
* Add support for opt-in tags by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/46
* Fix automation by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/49
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7 by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/50
* Migrate renovate config by @renovate-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

name: v0.15.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

```


## What's Changed
* Add support for generated files with custom imports by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/40
* Skip builtin modules by @keith in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/41
* Deduplicate import dirs in mypy path, minor cleanups by @mark-thm in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_mypy/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0
